All deliverables, timelines, and responsibilities are subject to a mutually agreed scope of work and service agreement.
We do not guarantee specific commercial outcomes or investment success, and any use of this service is at the client's discretion.
Aurygen Technologies does not assume liability for third-party systems, integrations, or infrastructure decisions made without our direct involvement.
Ongoing maintenance and content updates post-delivery are available under separate support packages, unless otherwise specified.
